requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10/11
  • Processor: Pentium III or AMD Athlon 1,5 GHz
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 5700 or Radeon 9600 with 128 MB of RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.8+
  • Processor: i5 2.0 ghz+ (2013 and newer)
  • Memory: 5 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 5000+ with at least 1.5 GRAM
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.8+
  • Processor: i5 2.5 ghz+ (2014 and newer)
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA or ATI dedicated card
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
